summary: Pablo Emilio Escobar Gaviria  was a Colombian drug lord.
full_text: Pablo Emilio Escobar Gaviria  was a notorious Colombian drug lord who, at the height of his career, supplied about 80% of the cocaine smuggled into the United States. Often called "The King of Cocaine", he was the wealthiest criminal in history, with an estimated known net worth of US$30 billion by the early 1990s, and approximately US$100 billion when including money that was buried in different places throughout Colombia. He was also one of the top ten richest men in the world at his prime.
title: Pablo Escobar
